extends java.lang.Object

    Hexagon Engine by Hexagon Software Copyright (c) 2020 Hexagon Software Please read the README and the LICENSE file before contributing/using.

    Felix Eckert

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise(java.lang.String title,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       boolean resizable)
        Initialises the Engine. Must be executed before Game Loop start.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the window
        width - The width of the window
        height - The height of the window

      • start

        Starts the gameloop
        Parameters:
